version_description: Hello all. I've been away for some time as I've found a new job and it's time consuming and although most of my day is spent at said job, I do try to do what I can even if a little on this app. I still believe in this app and the purpose it provides, as it isn't something that is aimed at short term gain rather a long term gain in mental and physical health. I hope you find it useful to keep your life better balanced. Stay safe.

feature.title: Redact and Lock Tasks
feature.description: Hide sensitive information and increase security from prying eyes and curious creatures.

feature.title: Multiple Notes
feature.description: Organise notes into brief points, with a limit of 5.

feature.title: Photos
feature.description: Capture an important note on the go and attach it to an important daily task.

feature.title: UI Overhaul
feature.description: With the introduction of iOS 14, coalesces the latest UI/UX experience, making all components within the app easier to use and intuitive than before.

feature.title: What new page
feature.description: Keep an eye here to track new updates and patches. Now organised in JSON format, for faster and easier compilation (mainly great for me).

feature.title: Alarm Presets at 5 minute increments
feature.description: Easily select a timer to trigger in the next multiple of 5 minutes within the hour

feature.title: All day reminder triggers
feature.description: Previously would not trigger. Now they do.
